lead_paragraph: South Africa have accused an Australian TV station of harassing captain Faf du Plessis after a reporter was involved in a physical confrontation with a team security guard at Adelaide Airport on Monday.

headline.print_headline: South Africa Complain of Media 'Harassment' After Airport Fracas
headline.main: South Africa Complain of Media 'Harassment' After Airport Fracas

snippet: South Africa have accused an Australian TV station of harassing captain Faf du Plessis after a reporter was involved in a physical confrontation with a team security guard at Adelaide Airport on Monday....
